title: Particle motion along parametricly def. path

content.question: During the time period from t = 0 to t = 6 seconds, a particle moves along the path given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>cos</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>π</mi> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiodaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41EA@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>π</mi> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiwdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41F2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (a) Find the position of the particle when t = 2.5.

frqParts.text: During the time period from t = 0 to t = 6 seconds, a particle moves along the path given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>cos</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>π</mi> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiodaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41EA@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>π</mi> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiwdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41F2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (a) Find the position of the particle when t = 2.5.
(b) On the axes provided below, sketch the graph of the path of the particle from t = 0 to t = 6. Indicate the direction of the particle along its path.
(c) How many times does the particle pass through the point found in part (a)?
(d) Find the velocity vector for the particle at any time t.
(e) Write and evaluate an integral expression, in terms of sine and cosine, that gives the distance the particle travels from t = 1.25 to t = 1.75.

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.6: (BC ONLY) Solving Motion Problems Using Parametric and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
